mapper.insert: insert into tbl_order(ordernum, pronum, id, paymethod, payprice, orderdate) values(seq_order.nextval, #{pronum}, #{id}, #{paymethod}, #{payprice}, sysdate)
mapper.select: select ordernum, tpro.pronum, tpro.proname, torder.id, paymethod, payprice, orderdate from tbl_order torder, tbl_product tpro where (torder.id = #{id}) and (torder.pronum = tpro.pronum) order by ordernum desc
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_vbank(id, vbnum, vbname, vbholder, vbdate) values(#{id}, #{vbnum}, #{vbname}, #{vbholder}, #{vbdate})
